definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: She plays the clarinet, goes on theatre trips and watches television.
sentences.chinese: 她吹單簧管，上劇院，看電視。

sentences.english: There is a clarinet and the sheet music for clarinet solos.
sentences.chinese: 還有單簧管和用於單簧管獨奏的樂譜。

sentences.english: There is a clarinet and the sheet music for clarinet solos.
sentences.chinese: 還有單簧管和用於單簧管獨奏的樂譜。

sentences.english: Serenade for flute, oboe, clarinet, horn and bassoon, Music-making in the Forest.
sentences.chinese: 單簧管，圓號，大管版小夜曲，音樂在森林中完成。

sentences.english: A clarinet and bassoon and other instruments start playing.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，單簧管，低音管和其它樂器也開始了演奏。

sentences.english: I encourage oboe and clarinet players to use plenty of vibrato .
sentences.chinese: 我鼓勵演奏雙簧管和單簧管的樂手們多使用顫音。

sentences.english: Heckles played clarinet in band, and I played clarinet.
sentences.chinese: 他在樂隊裏吹單簧管，我也是。

sentences.english: I have been playing the clarinet for 8 years and I have recently switched lesson teachers.
sentences.chinese: 我已經學習單簧管8年了，最近，我剛換了一位老師。

sentences.english: The bass clarinet forms a solid bass for the woodwind group.
sentences.chinese: 低音單簧管在木管樂組中形成濃重的低音。

sentences.english: He was the first jazz clarinetist to play with symphony orchestras.
sentences.chinese: 他是第一個和交響樂團合作的爵士單簧管演奏家。

sentences.english: Is there anything to keep a person like yourself to become and excellent clarinetist?
sentences.chinese: 有什麼會阻擋你成爲一個優秀的單簧管樂手嗎？

sentences.english: Scanning her list, she replied, Clarinets are okay.
sentences.chinese: 她檢視了一下單子，答道，單簧管可以。

definition: double reed wind instrument (such as oboe or bassoon)
hulusi, aka cucurbit flute (a kind of free reed wind instrument)
Handel (name)/George Frideric Handel (1685-1759), German-born Baroque composer, naturalized British in 1727
